title: Microsoft aims to reduce “tedious” business tasks with new AI tools
description: LLM tech comes to Power Platform and Dynamics 365, courtesy of OpenAI partnership.

title: Scientists have found Lake Huron wreck of 19th century ship that sank in 1894
description: The Ironton schooner collided with the freighter Ohio, which was found in 2017.

title: Twitter revenue fell 40% in December amid advertiser exodus, report says
description: Twitter doesn't report earnings publicly anymore but told investors of decline.

title: New “Canary” channel will showcase more-experimental, less-stable Windows builds
description: More frequently released updates means more channels for public beta testing.

title: Twitter API error broke the site today as Musk blames “brittle” platform
description: Error message: "Your current API plan does not include access to this endpoint."

title: Thousands scammed by AI voices mimicking loved ones in emergencies
description: In 2022, $11 million was stolen through thousands of impostor phone scams.

title: The small launch industry is brutal—yes, even more than you thought
description: "He must be out of money by now, surely?"

title: Apple’s 15-inch MacBook Air reportedly coming soon, along with new Mac Pro and iMac
description: 15-inch Air would be Apple's first crack at a cheaper large-screened laptop.

title: Unkillable UEFI malware bypassing Secure Boot enabled by unpatchable Windows flaw
description: BlackLotus represents a major milestone in the continuing evolution of UEFI bootkits.

title: Meta Quest Pro sees 33 percent price drop after less than five months
description: High-end headset goes from $1,500 to $1,000; Quest 2 gets partial price drop, too.

title: Amazon’s big dreams for Alexa fall short
description: Teams working on voice assistant hit hard by the largest cuts in company’s history.

title: Tesla cuts Models S and X prices for the second time in eight weeks
description: The EVs were revolutionary at launch but are now aging compared to competitors.

title: Tesla is recalling 3,470 Model Y crossovers for second-row seat fix
description: This time the recall requires physical inspection, not an OTA software update.

title: Rivian recalls nearly 13,000 electric trucks and SUVs for seatbelt fix
description: A missized sensor can stop the passenger airbag from working properly.

title: The gold rush for the next round of military launch contracts has started
description: Everything you've ever wanted to know about military launch procurement.

title: HBO’s The Last of Us episode 8 ruins one of the game’s best villains
description: Joel and Ellie barrel through a grisly speedbump on the way to the finale.
